name: PenPal
description:
Get drawn into a world, of pixel and pen.

Where pens n' rubbers, can be foe or friend.

-Sir Era

Set in a world of stationery, PenPal is a short puzzle platformer about a mobile inkwell venturing to find their pen pal. 

Ink is a powerful tool in this stationery world. Use it to change the colour of any character and discover new laws of ink - like making friend from foe, or maybe turning an enemy into a convenient steppingstone.

Along the way encounter stationery inspired characters and travel across different colour focused levels in the hope of finally reuniting with your PenPal.

This is my first game using unity and it was made for the final module of my foundation course. 

Thanks for playing!
